metadata.dc:author: Martínez-Forde, J M
García de Lorenzo, A
Jiménez, M
Yus, S
metadata.dc:description: Cardiac tamponade linked to parenteral nutrition is a rare complication, but often fatal. This clinical study describes a case in which this complication occurs, with a review of literature on the subject and several recommendations for prevention and treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Taponamiento cardíaco fatal asociado con nutrición parenteral total.
[Fatal cardiac tamponade associated with total parenteral nutrition].
